Challenge players worldwide in real-time: Challenge players worldwide in real-time 1v1 battles. Climb the leaderboard and prove your knowledge.

welcome.title: Master the
welcome.subtitle: Challenge friends in real-time, generate unique quizzes with AI, and climb the global leaderboard. Prove your knowledge in the ultimate battle of wits.

about.title: About Quizz
about.description: Quizz is the ultimate platform for knowledge enthusiasts. We combine real-time technology with AI to create a unique and competitive quiz experience. Whether you want to challenge friends, climb the leaderboards, or just learn something new, Quizz is the place for you.
about.mission_desc: To make learning fun and accessible to everyone, everywhere through the power of gamification and community.
about.team_desc: We are a passionate team of developers, designers, and trivia buffs dedicated to building the best quiz experience on the web.

features.title: Why Choose Quizz?
features.subtitle: Discover the tools that make us the best platform for competitive learning.
features.realtime_desc: Experience lag-free 1v1 battles with players across the globe using our advanced WebSocket infrastructure.
features.ai_desc: Never play the same quiz twice. Our AI generates unique questions on any topic you can imagine.
features.competitive_desc: Climb the ELO-based matchmaking ladder and earn your spot among the top players.
features.community_desc: Join thousands of active players, participate in tournaments, and make new friends.
features.global_desc: Questions available in multiple languages, connecting knowledge seekers worldwide.
features.stats_desc: Track your progress with in-depth analytics on your performance across different categories.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start for free, upgrade for more power.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the product and billing.
faq.a1: Yes! You can play unlimited standard games and participate in leaderboards for free.
faq.q2: How does the AI quiz generation work?
faq.a2: We use advanced large language models to generate unique questions based on your chosen topic and difficulty.
faq.q3: Can I play with my friends?
faq.a3: Absolutely. You can create private lobbies and invite your friends to compete directly.
faq.a4: We use a modification of the ELO rating system. Winning against higher-rated players grants more points.
faq.a5: Yes, verified students can get 50% off the Pro plan. Contact support for details.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1_content: We collect information you provide directly to us when you create an account, such as your name, email address, and profile information. We also automatically collect certain information when you use our services, including your IP address and device information.
privacy.section2_content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to process your transactions, giving you a personalized experience, and to communicate with you.
privacy.section3_content: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this policy, such as when required by law or to protect our rights.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1_content: By accessing or using Quizz, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the service.
terms.section2_content: When you create an account with us, you must provide us information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms.
terms.section3_content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Quizz and its licensors.
